metadata.title: CVE-2022-2481 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Use after free in Views in Google Chrome prior to 103.0.5060.134 allowed aremote attacker who convinced a user to engage in specific userinteractions to potentially exploit heap corruption via UI interaction.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
